intro: Aeonium × chamorgense, commonly known as the "Chocolate Soldier," is a hybrid succulent plant native to the Canary Islands. It features rosettes of thick, fleshy, dark green leaves that often have a reddish or purplish hue, especially under stress or in full sun. The plant produces tall, branched inflorescences with yellow flowers in the spring. It is drought-tolerant and thrives in well-draining soil with plenty of sunlight. Aeonium × chamorgense is popular among succulent enthusiasts for its striking appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
